description: A Danish Renzu directorial. Songs of Paradise is a story of the Padma Shri Raj Begum. The movie tells a tale of Kashmir's first female playback singer, uplifting women in a culturally conservative society. She is the epitome of bravery. Her music, heritage and preservation have inspired the movie's heart-wrenching narrative, taking place when women were culturally and emotionally constrained.
title: Songs of Paradise Now Available for Streaming on Prime Video: What You Need to Know

description: SpaceX’s Starship rocket has scored a landmark success on its 10th test flight. On Aug. 26, 2025, the 400-foot booster launched flawlessly, completed hot-stage separation, and deployed eight dummy Starlink satellites — its first-ever payload. The upper stage then re-entered Earth’s atmosphere, surviving long enough to reignite an engine and splash down in the Indian Ocean, despite shedding some debris.
title: SpaceX Starship Aces 10th Flight, Takes Major Step Toward Reusability

description: Astronomers have captured a groundbreaking sight: WISPIT 2b, a baby gas giant planet forming within a dusty, multi-ring protoplanetary disk around a young Sun-like star 430 light-years away. Infrared images from the Very Large Telescope show the planet carving a dark path in the rings as it feeds on gas and dust. This rare discovery provides the first direct evidence of a planet embedded in a multi-ring disk.
title: A Planet Is Being Born: Astronomers Capture Rare Cosmic Snapshot

description: Almost 200 years after the Carnot limit defined the maximum efficiency of heat engines, scientists have introduced a microscopic design that seems to break the rule. Called the “Gambling Carnot Engine,” it works by monitoring a single trapped particle and stepping in at just the right instant. This clever feedback process allows the engine to convert nearly all absorbed heat into usable work.
title: New ‘Gambling Carnot Engine’ Challenges 200-Year-Old Thermodynamic Law

description: Tehran is a spy thriller movie that is based on the true events that occurred during the 2012 Delhi bombing. The movie stars John Abraham in the lead role, while Manushi Chillar and Madhurima Tuli support him throughout. The movie explores themes of conspiracy, bombing, threat, and patriotism.
title: John Abraham-Starrer Tehran Is Now Streaming Online: All Details Here

description: Harlan Coben finally arrives on Prime Video this October 25, with the new series Lazarus. The thriller explores a decade-old murder with family secrets coming out. The series stars Sam Claflin and Billy Nighy and promises to keep the viewers hooked. Stay tuned to watch this mysterious psychological thriller on October 25.
title: Lazarus Miniseries: When and Where to Watch the Horror Thriller Online

description: NASA has unveiled the Orion Mission Evaluation Room at Johnson Space Center to support Artemis II. Staffed by engineers from NASA, Lockheed Martin, ESA, and Airbus, the facility will provide round-the-clock oversight of Orion’s performance as it carries astronauts around the Moon. The new center ensures real-time monitoring, rapid problem-solving, and data analysis to secure crew safety and guide future missions
title: NASA Sets Up Orion Mission Evaluation Room to Safeguard Artemis II Astronauts

description: NASA’s Perseverance rover has photographed a helmet-shaped rock on Mars. Nicknamed “Horneflya,” the unusual spherule-covered formation intrigues scientists exploring how water, volcanic activity, or chemical processes shaped the Martian surface. Captured by Mastcam-Z, the discovery adds to Perseverance’s catalogue of strange formations and offers vital insights into the Red Planet’s geological history.
title: NASA’s Perseverance Rover Spots Helmet-Like Rock on Mars, Sparks Geology Debate

description: The Telugu romcom Rambo in Love arrives on JioHotstar on 12 September 2025. With Payal Chengappa in the lead and Raghunandan Kuppuswamy directing, the series blends workplace comedy with heartfelt romance. It is expected to be a breezy, colourful entertainer for young audiences who enjoy lighthearted love stories filled with cultural and modern touches
title: Rambo in Love OTT Release Date: When and Where to Stream the Telugu Rom-Com Series Online

description: The Terminal List: Dark Wolf has dropped three fantastic episodes on Prime Video. New episodes are released every Wednesday until September 24. The series follows Navy SEAL Ben Edwards as he faces betrayal, loses his career, and also joins covert CIA missions that lead to a deadly nuclear conspiracy in Europe.
title: The Terminal List: Dark Wolf Now Streaming on Prime Video: Know All About This Action Thriller Online

description: In Season 2, Part 2 on Wednesday, she is back with a growing reputation after she has saved Nevermore. In this, she gets a psychic vision of her friend Enid's possible death, so set to save her, what will Wednesday do? To understand, watch Season 2, Part 2.
title: Wednesday Season 2 Part 2: When and Where to Watch New Season of Addam's Family Online?

description: The Realme 15T is all set to be launched in India as the successor to the Realme 14T. The launch date of the upcoming handset has been made official and several of the features have been teased. It will debut with 50-megapixel front and rear cameras. The handset will sport a 4,000nits AMOLED screen, backed by a 7,000mAh battery.
title: Realme 15T: Launch Date, Expected Price in India, Specifications, Features and More

description: iPhone 17 series, consisting of four models, is expected to be announced on September 9 during Apple's Awe Dropping launch event. Latest leaks suggest the pre-order date and sale date of the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Air (Slim), iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max.
title: iPhone 17 Series: Here Are All the New Details Emerged About Pre-Order Timeline and Availability
